SELECT
,
FROM m LEFT JOIN ruiec_module_department md ON m.id = md.module_id LEFT JOIN ruiec_department d ON md.department_id = d.id ORDER BY m.sort DESC, m.id DESC

FROM m LEFT JOIN ruiec_module_department md ON md.module_id = m.id LEFT JOIN ruiec_department_user du ON du.department_id = md.department_id LEFT JOIN ruiec_user u ON u.id = du.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY m.sort DESC, m.id DESC
